participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily enjoys expressing herself through dance and values the balance between her studies and personal life.
participant_1.background: I enjoy working with my hands and seeing the results of my work. I love dancing. I will study computer science. I used to be very closed off about my sexuality. I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is reflective and artistic, often exploring their identity and interests through hair dye and creative outlets while feeling the pressure of career choices.
participant_2.background: I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me. I don’t know if I enjoy programming, or if it’s my only choice. I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean. I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I have long flowing hair.

content.text: Hi there, my name is [participant_1 name].  What's yours?
Hi [participant_2 name], I'm [participant_2 name].  What are you interested in?
I love dancing, working with my hands, and balancing my school work with my social life and my workouts.
Oh, that's cool! I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
That's interesting, I've never dyed my hair before.
I know, it's a lot of upkeep!  Do you have any pets?
I used to have a dog, but he passed away a few years ago.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I have a cat named Mittens.
Thanks!  What are you majoring in?
I'm going to study computer science.
Oh, cool! I'm not sure if I enjoy programming or if it's my only choice.  What do you like about it?
I like the challenge of it, and I think it's a really useful skill to have.
Yeah, it definitely is.  I'm just not sure if it's for me.
Well, you could always try it out and see how you like it.
Yeah, I might do that.  Thanks for talking with me!
No problem, it was nice talking to you too
